channel.title: Fixed skillcape emote's on bluurrs [ show off]
channel.description:
Thanks to Silva and pb600
85% pb600 15% silva
[img]http://www.uploadgeek.com/image-1C2E_4C054A29.gif[/img] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NGCD2WvmJ9A]YouTube - 100% skillcape emote on Bluurrs client![/url]
i know its easy, but im kinda proud that this is finnaly fixed:D

item.title: Fixed skillcape emote's on bluurrs [ show off]
item.dc:creator: @locksmin locksmin
item.description:
@locksmin wrote:

Lost Valentino:

ty everybody, the only thing is was showing off is, that all weps, are fixed on bluurrs

Dang i remember when you had 27 Rep just like a month or so ago maybe lil longer now your at 113 jesus lol

item.title: Fixed skillcape emote's on bluurrs [ show off]
item.dc:creator: @locksmin locksmin
item.description:
@locksmin wrote:

[quote=“failer, post:10, topic:342269”][quote author=badger41 link=topic=438680.msg3227434#msg3227434 date=1275715809]

omfg valentino you suck serious this was 1.5months ago wtf u trying to show?

and wtf are you trying to prove by saying he sucks?
you surely are fitting your name, sir failer.
[/quote]

dont cry no ones likes you.[/quote]

Aww failer it’s so cute on how he makes those 1st grade remarks nice job kid

And i wanna see you actually release a source with skillcape emotes gwd maps etc…

You probly couldnt even do all that with TUTs people showing you how to do it so don’t talk shit because karma comes around bitch.

And since im guessing your gonna say don’t get mad over a game lol well im not mad i can give to shits about what you think im just proving a point and backing someone up GF :o

PS; Nice job valentino

Read full topic
